Raymond Ofula bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri. Ọ nọwo na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri ihe karịrị afọ iri anọ
Ọ pụtakwara na ihe nkiri obodo na nke mba ụwa.

Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri dka To Walk with Lions (1999), Lara Croft: Tomb Raider - The Cradle of Life (2003), The White Masai (2005), Winterreise (2006) nakwa The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind (2019).  Ọ pụtakwara na Netflix show Queen Sono Raymond bụkwa onye ọka ikpe nwere nkà na-enyere aka ịmepụta ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nwere nkà na-abịanụ ya na ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Naomi Nga'nga na ihe ngosi TV nke Startimes Kenya kpọrọ dịka onye na-esote Ofula lụrụ Anne Ofula ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2008.
